solution_line_template: First find the total amount of money she saved: ${total_paid} - ${sister_contribution} = $<<{total_paid}-{sister_contribution}={total_saved}>>{total_saved}

Then divide that number by the number of months she saved to find the amount she saved each month: ${total_saved} / {months_saved} months = $<<{total_saved}/{months_saved}={saved_per_month}>>{saved_per_month}/month
